name: Space Cthulhu
description:
Space, Cthulhu, You

You are be under attack on your own spaceship by monsters with a lot of tentacles. Your only hope is the board computer on the other side of the spaceship. Run or you'll be the next lunch for cthulhu.

"Out of control":

* Game Mechanics: Ammunition, health-regeneration, speed-modifier, etc. are controlled by a conveyor belt-system

*  Theme: Never ending enemies.

Keybindings:

* WASD: Move

* Mouse: Rotate character

* Left mouse button: Shoot

* R: Reload

Mady by Leif-Eric and Maxie

Sounds from humble bundle pack.

We are going to upload a finished version after the rating progress. (More effects, more polish, more animations, better enemies)
